item.title: About me
item.description: Hi there I am Rishabh Soni, I also go by the name of rootxrishabh. I’m a final year undergrad engineer from India studying Computer Science and actively contributing to the cloud native landscape. I’m very enthusiastic about open source software, devops and microservices I like to work with softwares that involves devops tools, linux, containers and and cloud platforms. This has given me the experience both as a backend and devops engineer.
